sub_title: Director Wageningen Centre for Development Innovation  at Wageningen University & Research
summary: Hedwig Bruggeman is leading Wageningen Centre for Development Innovation, one of the nine  Research Institutes  of Wageningen University & Research. Hedwig gained over 30 years of experience as a technical advisor, coordinator of complex programmes and director- through several long term assignments in Africa. She has worked in many different environments ranging from CSO's, governments, network organisations and research institutions. Hedwig's drive and focus is on co-creation of knowledge  and connecting competencies of professionals accross the boarders of their own organisations  and institutions in order to assure maximum impact on the sustainable development goals
